reviewText: this anime is great but it just shows up too dark can not lighten it even with your TV

Anime: 6/10 (above average)

Product 2/5
-1 for framerate switching and 3:2 pulldown
-1 for MPEG2 compression artifacts
-1 for heavy color/gradient banding
-0 for typical bare-minimum subtitles
(note: all volumes have the same problems)
Yuske starts to find out the truth of his existance.  His personality takes a radical change by the end of the DVD. you also find the reasons behind shiro's actions
